alert.note: Alert for Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 19 at 8:05PM EST until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Northeast Cape Fear River near Burgaw. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water deepens on the lowest portions of River Bend Road and River Birch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.3 feet Saturday morning. - Advisory stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon.
